CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL( NNR_or_NOT__c , 'Pay & Walk'), IF( Submitter_Assignment_Date__c + 30 > Landlord_Signed_Agreement__c , true, false), false)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Start: Submitter is first identified End: Landlord Signed Agreement (Date) Only applicable if Pay & Walk is selected, not "NNR/NOT" If <=30 days, then flag this PO needing to be issued
CustomField.label: Schedule Incentive Payment #1
